name: The Parking Lot
description:
DEMO VERSION

Its 2AM, at the local underworldian inconvenience store. Its time to settle things once and for all. Who will be the last Dead Beat Standing?

Fight for your unlife against hordes of the skeleton fans of the rapping reaper herself, Mori Calliope. Fight alone, or with a friend (or maybe even against them).  Supports Keyboard + Mouse and Controllers plus remapping for both.

ADDITIONAL CREDITS

Based on Mori Calliope of Hololive EN MYTH COVER Corporation

Edited Character Sprites originally from "SCOTT PILGRIM VS THE WORLD: THE GAME" by Ubisoft

"Rewired" Controller Input system by Guavaman Enterprises:  https://guavaman.com/projects/rewired/

Sound Effects Generated from www.sfxr.me

Song used is [Instrumental Remake] Off With Their Heads - Mori Calliope (Prod. MachiChunky)

DEMO VERSION

Watch out for bugs, updates will come out sporadically though I'm hoping to complete the boss battle/unlockable character by April. Enjoy!
